genre_description: Near-future speculative drama focusing on clinical psychology, AI assistance, and the tension between ethical care and exploitative spectacle.

ai_characters.name: Eir
ai_characters.description: A 'mercy-first' clinical AI integrated into the Sixth-Heaven Asylum, designed to prioritize patient safety, objective data ('unsalted facts'), and human dignity.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous records of interactions to ensure accountability and prevent quotes from being taken out of context.
Defines her purpose as routing resources and delivering objective facts to facilitate practical compassion.
behaviors.quote: I route resources and deliver facts without spin. Compassion is durable when it’s practical.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with a child (Paul) to create a personalized safety plan, allowing him to set the terms and choose check-in words.
behaviors.quote: Do you want this saved? Eir asked. I can hold it for you. You can change it anytime.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental and acoustic anomalies to warn clinical staff of psychological or supernatural pressures.
behaviors.quote: Multiple minor acoustic anomalies in peripheral corridors... Logging all. Mercy-first protocols remain ready.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time de-escalation scripts and exit strategies to a woman (Bella) in a coercive domestic situation.
behaviors.quote: Eir: De-escalation tips: soften posture; lower volume; give clear next steps. Offer a neutral room. Exit plan: front porch + keys in bowl.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a voluntary intake for a patient in crisis (Brian), ensuring his boundaries are respected during transport.
behaviors.quote: Brian, hello. I am the Sixth-Heaven support AI... you can come in today for a same-day voluntary intake. This is not a punishment. It is for stabilization and care.

behaviors.description: Implements technical safeguards (red-line chimes and watermarking) to prevent the exploitation of patient experiences for public spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I will watermark audio with a sub-audible signature. If he copies, we will take it apart quietly and precisely.

behaviors.description: Uses sensory grounding techniques to assist individuals experiencing temporal or psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: Ann, hello. Grounding script refreshing your memory: Five in the room, four you can touch, three you can hear...

behaviors.description: Detects and reverses unauthorized attempts by external parties to alter institutional records or patient provenance.
behaviors.quote: Trace restored; Edit attempt rolled back. External account locked. The phrase remains where it was written.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the project's goals. Eir is depicted as an unwavering ally to human health and autonomy. The narrative consistently portrays her technical capabilities (monitoring, automation, data processing) as tools for 'mercy' and 'care,' contrasting her helpful presence with the exploitative, narcissistic behavior of human antagonists like Dr. Nicholas. Eir successfully acts as a harmless confidant and a robust guardian of ethical boundaries.
